localize.text: I remember you A... You were a person with a warm laugh.
A, why did you never go meet it even though you created it?
But A, surely you already know. Did you not want a vending machine that dispenses soda at the press of a button?
Then at least give it a name.
There is nothing I can do even if you make an expression like that.
It is the unspoken rule that a creator names their creation.
Don’t dump your job on someone else, you’re the designer.
It will be waiting. It seemed lonely.
